service_name: Design, Development, Test Services for Identity Management and Access Governance
page_content:
Praxism Limited

Design, Development, Test Services for Identity Management and Access Governance

The service enables organisations to design, develop and test and an Identity Management and Access Governance solution in a Cloud environment, delivered via an IaaS; PaaS or SaaS model. The service follows a proven staged approach that enables customer control over step-in/step-out points, ensuring optimal return on investment.

Features

  • Cross Vendor Coverage: Aveksa; HID; NetIQ; Microsoft; SailPoint; Stealthbits
  • Staged Approach: Design; Develop; Test; with step-in/step-out control
  • Value Realisation: Staged to deliver value and incorporate feedback improvements
  • Engagement: Business led design matched with best fit solution deployment
  • Cloud Model Neutral: Covers Public; Private and Hybrid
  • Appropriate Access Control: Consistently enforced access rights across enterprise systems
  • Best Practice: Proven and mature methodologies and processes incorporated
  • Coverage: Identity Management; Access Management, Access Governance, SSO, AD Administration
  • Full Solution Documentation: Full design, test and development documentation set
  • Audit Integration: With existing SIEM platform or included SIEM deployment

Benefits

  • Engagement Model: Reflecting business requirements and full business engagement
  • Single Enterprise Solution Design Model: Covering all consumer types
  • Single Enterprise Solution Design: Covering both Cloud/non-Cloud systems and data
  • Staged Approach: Reduced risk with active End-User engagement model
  • Best Fit Solution: Providing best value for money
  • Value Realisation: Staged to deliver value at earliest possible opportunity
  • Full traceability: Requirements through to design and development realisation
  • Core Value: Self-service provisioning, saving time and cost
  • Improved and Optimised Processes: Improved and optimised lifecycle processes
  • Efficiency: Automated identity lifecycle of all digital identities

Pricing

£820 to £1240 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Day
